Description_lang: Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, $?s53376&c2[causing Judgment to generate $53376s3 additional Holy Power, ]?s53376&c3[each Holy Power spent causing you to explode with Holy light for $326731s1 damage to nearby enemies, ]?s53376&c1[reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by $53376s2%, ][]$?s326730[allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, ][]$?s384442&s384376[increasing your damage, healing and critical strike chance by $s2% for $d.]?!s384442&s384376[increasing your damage and healing by $s1% for $d.]?!s384376&s384442[increasing your critical strike chance by $s3% for $d.][and activating all the effects learned for Avenging Wrath for $d.]
